selections.name: Chasentheone
selections.reason: Won last two starts with 91 figures; in peak form but stepping up slightly in class competition.

selections.name: Athens Moon

danger_horse.name: Cousin Richie

selections.name: Valley Echo

selections.name: Garavani

selections.name: First Call
selections.reason: Strong form (2nd last out with 84, won prior with 95); main threat to top pick.

selections.name: Dagger Ranch
